name: the unseen and the unheard demo
name_original: the unseen and the unheard demo
description:
- note: this is a demo! bugs/visual glitches may be present - 

you wake up in a completely normal town. 

nothing is wrong.

there's nothing to worry about.

meet your new neighbours! and make new friends :)

- two endings

- movement WASD

made in 5 days for the snappy gurus game off summer 2022

all art, audio, game design and programming (every aspect of the game) done by me, in the game jam timeframe.

in game font: https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Bigelow+Rules
